text.autoconfig.leveluphp.title: Level Up HP
text.autoconfig.leveluphp.option.enableX: Values like starting health, xp gain, and death penalties are customizable with data packs, not with this config. See the mod's wiki for more information, including instructions.
advancements.leveluphp.level_up.title: Level Up HP
advancements.leveluphp.level_up_max.desc: Earn the maximum number of HP levels
